translation.Message_0_Page_0: At a point, we controlled a sizable amount of Northern Ireland, including Belfast.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: The <color=blue>Coalition</color>, who are remnants of the British Navy, showed up and began launching attacks on Belfast. I figure it was the amount of military supplies we stockpiled there that made them focus on Belfast.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: They were winning at first. However it seems the hordes of turned doubled and killed off the remaining <color=red>IFR</color> and <color=blue>Coalition</color> soldiers. I doubt the <color=blue>Blues</color> had it as bad as we did!
